work.name: Dicer.ai
work.summary: Working on leveraging Gen AI for Ad Content Generation

work.name: Future Automation and Research Laboratory (FARLab), Cornell Tech
work.summary: Researched in understanding the correlation of human empathy towards failures in task performance, both in humans and robots to explore the intricacies of human emotions and utilize this comprehension as a learning parameter for robots. By recognizing their actions and leveraging this understanding, the aim is to empower robots to improve their performance in a variety of tasks.

work.name: Sabre Corporation
work.summary: Worked on the Passenger Recommendation Engine in the Departure Control System (DCS - IQ) platform of Sabre.

work.name: Bangalore Endoscopic Surgery Training Institute and Research Centre (BEST)
work.summary: Worked on the project titled - "Developing a training module for surgical residents and surgeons to learn to perform laparoscopic cholecystectomy," which won the Discovery Award by the Global Surgical Training Challenge by MIT - Solve

work.name: Cornell Bowers CIS, Cornell University
work.summary: Graduate TA for the course CS 2024 [C++]

education.institution: M S Ramaiah Institute of Technology (MSRIT), Bangalore, India

awards.title: Student Innovation Grant Award
awards.awarder: Artificial Intelligence and Robotics Technology Park (ARTPARK), Indian Institute of Science (IISc)
awards.summary: Awarded the ‘Student Innovation Grant Program’ in Artificial Intelligence, Robotics and Autonomous Systems, during the 2021 call from Artificial Intelligence and Robotics Technology Park (ARTPARK) hosted by Indian Institute of Science (IISc) (a joint-initiative of IISc, Alfoundry, Department of Science and Technology (DST) and Government of Karnataka) for the project titled - "Sign Language Translator using Sensor-based Hand Gesture Recognition (HGR)".
